title: Happy Birthday, Umi-san!
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>Umi-san, happy birthday.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Wow, these flowers are beautiful! Thank you so much, Shioriko!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I included your birth flower.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Birth flower? I don’t even know mine......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>This flower means “sincerity.” It’s perfect for you, Umi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Huh!? Y-You think too highly of me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>That’s not true! Honoka-san and the rest of μ’s spoke so highly of you when we were preparing for the party! It’s all because of your great personality.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Honoka and the others... I always thought they were annoyed by me nagging them…... So from now on, I might not say things like “do your homework” anymore.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>You should tell them that. Be honest with them, Umi-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Ah.....! Y-You’re right! I got lost in my thoughts there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
